dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9293 IH: To amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to make a technical correction to the Navajo Nation Water Resources Development Trust Fund, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Leger Fernandez introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to make a technical correction to the Navajo Nation Water Resources Development Trust Fund, and for other purposes.

section.header: Authorization of payment of adjusted interest on the Navajo Nation Water Resources Development Trust Fund
section.text: The Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–11) is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 10701(e)(1)(A)(vii), by striking 10702. and inserting 10702, except for deposits made pursuant to section 10702(g).; and

subparagraph.text: in subsection (a)(1), by striking subsection (f) and inserting subsections (f) and (g);
in subsection (a)(2), by striking subsection (d) and inserting subsections (d) and (g); and
by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: There is authorized to be appropriated for deposit in the Trust Fund $6,357,674.46.
